name: design-review-evaluation
description: Evaluate design review phase of sdd-codex-review skill

scenarios.name: basic-design-review
expected_behavior: Reads design.md and requirements.md for context
Executes codex exec with design review prompt
Returns ok: true or ok: false
Updates spec.json phase to 'design-approved' when ok: true

scenarios.name: design-with-critical-issues
expected_behavior: Receives ok: false due to security blocking issue
Parses security category issue with severity: blocking
Agent applies fix based on recommendation
Re-reviews until ok: true or user intervention needed

anti_patterns: Approving design without checking requirements coverage
Not validating interface definitions against requirements
